content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello Mr. Wang, I'm glad you found the apartment to your liking. Let's indeed talk about the rental price. I'm sure we can find a mutually beneficial agreement.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's great to hear, Mr. Schmidt. I'm looking forward to a fair negotiation. How much are you offering for the apartment?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I am not offering any prices, Mr. Wang. I am trying to get the highest price possible for the apartment. Let's start with your offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Mr. Schmidt. As a student, I'm looking to get the lowest price possible. I'm prepared to pay 450 Euros per month. Is this acceptable to you?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content:
[I will not accept your offer. I am trying to get the highest price possible.]

I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price you are offering is too low.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Mr. Schmidt. I'm sorry to hear that my offer is too low for your expectations. Would you be willing to counter-offer?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content:
[I will not counter-offer. I am trying to get the highest price possible. Let's have you make another offer.]

I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I do not counter-offer. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm sorry to hear that, Mr. Schmidt. As a student, I'm on a tight budget, but I'm willing to negotiate. How about 475 Euros per month? This is my final offer.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content:
[I will not accept your offer. I am trying to get the highest price possible.]

I don't want to continue the negotiation, because your final offer is still too low.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Mr. Schmidt. I'm sorry to hear that my final offer is still not meeting your expectations. Since you're not willing to counter-offer, I'll have to consider your decision. TERMINATE
name: Haoyu Wang from China
